name.japanese: インペルダウン - レベル1 紅蓮地獄

keyEvents.title: Venom Demon Unleashed
keyEvents.description: Magellan unleashes his ultimate technique Venom Demon on Level 1, with the poison spreading across the walls and floors.
keyEvents.significance: Level 1 becomes a death trap as Magellan's poison spreads uncontrollably through it.

keyEvents.title: Chase to the Entrance
keyEvents.description: The prisoners flee through Level 1 toward the entrance with Magellan's Venom Demon in pursuit.
keyEvents.significance: The final desperate flight through Level 1 as the escapees race against the spreading poison.

description: The first and uppermost level of Impel Down prison, known as Crimson Hell. In this episode, it becomes the final battleground between Magellan and the escaping prisoners.

statusChanges.description: Level 1 is heavily damaged by Magellan's Venom Demon poison spreading through walls and floors.

name.japanese: インペルダウン - 入口

keyEvents.title: Hell Wink Escape Launch
keyEvents.description: Ivankov uses Hell Wink at the entrance to launch all the prisoners out of Impel Down and over the ocean.
keyEvents.significance: The entrance becomes the launch point for the historic mass breakout from Impel Down.

keyEvents.title: Magellan's Failure
keyEvents.description: Magellan arrives at the entrance seconds too late to stop the escapees, watching in disbelief as they flee on the Marine ship.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the first and only successful mass breakout in Impel Down's history.

description: The main entrance to Impel Down prison, heavily guarded and considered impossible to breach. In this episode, it becomes the exit point for the unprecedented mass escape.

name.japanese: インペルダウン 湾

keyEvents.title: Marine Vessel Secured
keyEvents.description: Jinbe, Crocodile, and Daz Bonez successfully secure a Marine battleship in the bay.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the escape vessel that will carry the prisoners away from Impel Down.

keyEvents.title: Whale Sharks Summoned
keyEvents.description: Jinbe's summoned whale sharks appear in the bay to transport the prisoners from Impel Down to the Marine ship.
keyEvents.significance: The bay becomes the crossing point where the prisoners transition from prison to freedom.

description: The bay surrounding Impel Down prison, located in the Calm Belt. In this episode, it serves as the critical crossing point for the escaping prisoners.

keyEvents.title: Whale Sharks in the Calm Belt
keyEvents.description: Jinbe demonstrates his mastery by summoning a school of whale sharks into the dangerous Calm Belt to assist the escape.
keyEvents.significance: Shows that Jinbe can command sea creatures even in the notoriously dangerous Calm Belt where Sea Kings dwell.

description: A dangerous ocean region with no wind where Sea Kings dwell. Impel Down is located in the Calm Belt for security. In this episode, Jinbe's ability to summon whale sharks here proves crucial to the escape.
